items.description: Available only to residential consumers of the Cooperative in residences, condominiums, mobile homes or individually metered apartments. Rate 410 is available to those members who complete an agreement pursuant to the Cooperative's Pre-Paid Meter Program. Rate 710 is available to those members who have completed an interconnection agreement regarding the Cooperative's Net Metering Program.
items.energycomments: The Cooperative's Wholesale Power Cost Adjustment Schedule PCA will apply to all service supplied under this rate schedule.
items.name: Rate Codes 10, 410, and 710 Three-Phase
items.utility: Broad River Electric Coop, Inc (North Carolina)
